definitions.definition: A town , the capital of the district of Bagram , Parwan Province, Afghanistan ; the former capital of the Kushan Empire and the Kingdom of Kapisa .
A district of Parwan , Afghanistan , around the town.

main_definition: A town , the capital of the district of Bagram , Parwan Province, Afghanistan ; the former capital of the Kushan Empire and the Kingdom of Kapisa .
secondary_definitions: A district of Parwan , Afghanistan , around the town.
